snippet.title: Push Blox
snippet.description: Block-pushing puzzle game for iPhone/iPad, Android, PC/Mac, available from the App Store, Google Play and itch.io. Push same-coloured blocks together to win. Beware: blocks fall under gravity and stick together with neighbouring blocks of the same colour. You must form the right shapes out of these blocks to bring together all blocks of the same colour. High quality puzzles, no filler - Simple to learn but hard to master.
